needTo.title: Moving to the login page.
needTo.contents: You have entered incorrect login information.

accountError.title: You have entered incorrect login information.
accountError.contents: Unauthorized. Please check the email address and password and try again.

securityError.title: Account security
securityError.contents:
If the password input error occurs more than 5 times, it will be converted to a locked account for account security. When switching to a locked account, you must reset your password to log in.

Password Error : {n} times

lockedError.title: Locked Account
lockedError.contents: Switching Abnormal activity has been detected and converted to a locked account. Please reset your password.
